TypeSignature.Value: public interface BuildingBlockGalleryContentControl : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract BuildingBlockGalleryContentControl implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 表示文档构建基块的库，用户可将其插入到文档。

span.span: Represents a gallery of document building blocks that users can insert into a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示用户可以插入文档的*文档构建基块*的列表。 A displays a list of *document building blocks* that users can insert into a document. 文档构建基块是为了多次使用而创建的一段内容，例如共同的封面页、格式化表格或标头。A document building block is a piece of content that has been created to be used multiple times, such as a common cover page, a formatted table, or a header. 若要选择要显示的构建基块, 请使用和属性。To choose the building blocks that you want to display, use the and properties. 有关文档构建基块的详细信息, 请参阅[Word 2007 中面向开发人员的新增功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74aa6688-65b3-4167-997d-131f26ad8f84)。For more information about document building blocks, see [What's New for Developers in Word 2007](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74aa6688-65b3-4167-997d-131f26ad8f84). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 内容控件Content Controls 是八种类型的内容控件之一, 可用于在 Microsoft Office Word 中设计文档和模板。The is one of eight types of content controls that you can use to design documents and templates in Microsoft Office Word. 内容控件具有一个用户界面 (UI), 该界面具有像窗体这样的受控输入。Content controls have a user interface (UI) that has controlled input like a form. 你可以使用内容控件来防止用户编辑文档或模板的受保护节, 还可以将内容控件绑定到数据源。You can use content controls to prevent users from editing protected sections of the document or template, and you can also bind content controls to a data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示 Microsoft Office Word 提供的公式构造块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本适用于应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

value.span: 一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: A that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开有关 Word 的当前实例、应用于该实例的选项以及在实例中打开的当前文档的信息。The property exposes information about the current instance of Word, the options applied to that instance, and the current documents open within the instance.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 中显示的构造块的类别。

span.span: Gets or sets the category of the building blocks that are displayed in the .

value.span: 在 中显示的生成块的类别。

span.span: The category of the building blocks that are displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有构建基块都属于类别和库。All building blocks belong to a category and a gallery. 使用属性来指定显示的生成块的类别。 Use the property to specify the category of the building blocks that are displayed by the . 您可以将此属性的值设置为或`Built-In` `General` Microsoft Office Word 定义的类别, 也可以指定自定义类别。You can set the value of this property to the `Built-In` or `General` categories defined by Microsoft Office Word, or you can specify a custom category. 若要指定要在中显示的生成块库, 请使用属性。To specify which gallery of building blocks to display in the , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示 Microsoft Office Word 提供的公式构造块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 该示例将属性设置`Built-In`为类别。The example sets the property to the `Built-In` category. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本适用于应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在 中显示的生成块的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the building blocks that are displayed in the .

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有构建基块都属于库和类别。All building blocks belong to a gallery and a category. 使用属性指定要在中显示的生成块库。 Use the property to specify which gallery of building blocks to display in the . 只能显示构建基块的某些库。A can display only certain galleries of building blocks. 属性只能设置为以下值: The property can be set only to the following values: - `wdTypeAutoText` - `wdTypeCustom1` - `wdTypeCustom2` - `wdTypeCustom3` - `wdTypeCustom4` - `wdTypeCustom5` - `wdTypeCustomAutoText` - `wdTypeCustomEquations` - `wdTypeCustomQuickParts` - `wdTypeCustomTables` - `wdTypeEquations` - `wdTypeQuickParts` - `wdTypeTables` 若要指定显示的生成块的类别, 请使用属性。To specify the category of building blocks that are displayed by the , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示 Microsoft Office Word 提供的公式构造块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 该示例将属性设置为`wdTypeEquations`。The example sets the property to `wdTypeEquations`. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本适用于应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将 从文档复制到剪贴板。

span.span: Copies the from the document to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法时, 原始文件仍保留在文档中。When you use the method, the original remains on the document. 的副本(包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 获取一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建 的应用程序。

span.span: Gets a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the was created.

value.span: 一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建该控件的应用程序。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the control was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建的, 则属性返回十六进制数字 4D535744, 它表示字符串`MSWD`。If the was created in Microsoft Office Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string `MSWD`. 此字符串是 Word 的四字符创建者代码。This string is the four-character creator code for Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止用户编辑的内容, 请使用属性。To prevent users from editing the contents of a , use the property. 有关如何使用保护文档部分的详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[如何:使用内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls)保护文档的各个部分。For more information about how to use a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止用户从文档中删除, 请使用属性。To prevent users from deleting a from the document, use the property. 有关使用保护文档的一部分的详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[如何:使用内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls)保护文档的各个部分。For more information about using a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls).

summary.span: 获取 的父级。

span.span: Gets the parent of the .

value.span: 一个对象，表示 的父级。

span.span: An object that represents the parent of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的父级是包含控件的对象。The parent of the is the object in which the control is contained. 例如, 如果控件位于文档的主体中, 则此属性将返回一个对象。For example, if the control is in the body of the document, this property will return a object. 若要获取 或中包含的的父级, 请使用属性。To get the parent of a that is contained in a or a , use the property.

summary.span: 获取嵌套在另一个内容控件内的 的父内容控件。

value.span: 一个 ，表示 嵌套在其中的内容控件；如果 未嵌套在另一个内容控件中，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the content control in which the is nested; if the is not nested in another content control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和控件是只能包含嵌套内容控件的内容控件的类型。The and controls are the only types of content controls that can contain nested content controls.

summary.span: 获取或设置在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前在 中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

value.span: 在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前，在控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the control until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 占位符文本在用户选择某一构建基块或用数据源中的数据填充控件之前显示。The placeholder text is displayed until a user selects a building block or the control is populated with data from a data source. 若要将占位符文本设置为 或中的文本, 请使用方法。To set the placeholder text to text that is in a or a , use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示 Microsoft Office Word 提供的公式构造块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 该示例将属性设置为提示用户选择公式的字符串。The example sets the property to a string that prompts the user to choose an equation. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本适用于应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)]

value.span: 一个 ，表示 的内容。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问中的所有项。 Use the property to access all of the items in the . 你还可以使用此属性来访问控件中的文本格式和其他文本属性。You can also use this property to access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties. 有关对象的详细信息, 请参阅[Word 对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview)。For more information about objects, see [Word Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview). 若要仅访问在中显示的文本, 请使用属性。To access only the text that is displayed in the , use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPlaceholderText (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock = null, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range = null, string Text = "");

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPlaceholderText(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, string Text) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the placeholder text.
A that contains the placeholder text.
The placeholder text.

summary.span: 将 、 或字符串中的文本显示为 中的占位符文本。

span.span: Displays text that is in a , a , or a string as the placeholder text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 占位符文本在用户选择某一构建基块或用数据源中的数据填充控件之前显示。The placeholder text is displayed until a user selects a building block or the control is populated with data from a data source. 调用方法时仅使用其中一个参数。Only one of the parameters is used when you call the method. 如果指定了多个参数, 则 Microsoft Office Word 使用第一个指定的参数。If more than one parameter is specified, Microsoft Office Word uses the first specified parameter. 如果省略所有参数, 则占位符文本为空字符串。If all parameters are omitted, the placeholder text is an empty string. 若要获取的占位符文本, 请使用属性。To get the placeholder text of a , use the property. 还可以使用此属性将占位符文本设置为字符串。You can also use this property to set the placeholder text to a string.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 当前是否显示占位符文本。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is currently displaying placeholder text.

value.span: 如果 当前显示占位符文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displaying placeholder text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用户操作或某个其他操作更改了中的文本之前, 将显示占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until the text in the is changed by a user action or some other operation. 若要获取或设置占位符文本, 请使用属性或方法。To get or set the placeholder text, use the property or the method.

value.span: 一个要与 关联的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文档打开时 , 可以使用属性存储与关联的字符串。You can use the property to store a string that is associated with the while the document is open. 可以使用方法通过标记来查找内容控件。You can use the method to find a content control by its tag.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在编辑 时是否自动将该控件从文档中删除。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the is automatically deleted from the document when the control is edited.

value.span: 如果要在编辑 时自动将该控件删除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is automatically deleted when the control is edited; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为`true` ,则当用户键入控件时, 或者以编程方式更改控件中的文本时, 将自动删除。 If the property is `true`, the is automatically deleted when the user types in the control, or when the text in the control is changed programmatically. 当自动从文档中删除时, 该控件中的文本将保留在文档中。When the is automatically deleted from the document, the text in the control remains in the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要访问控件中的文本格式和其他文本属性, 请使用属性。To access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties, use the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the .

value.span: 的标题。

span.span: The title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击标题时, 标题将显示在的边框中。The title is displayed in the border of the when the user clicks it.
